sections.heading: Overview
content:
Dick Thom DDS, ND, has a background in both dentistry and naturopathy. He is
a full-time faculty member at the Northwest College of Naturopathic Medicine in
Portland, Oregon and a clinic instructor at Natural Health Centers, the
teaching clinic for the college. He is also in private practice at Natural Choices Health Clinic in
Beaverton, Oregon.

Thom's general family practice focuses on the identification and management
of food and environmental allergies and sensitivities, nutrition, drainage
therapy, homeopathy, herbal medicine, and hydrotherapy. He is the author of Coping With Food Intolerances, Surviving the Nineties.
